item.title: 准备IPO的条纹？
item.description:
我刚刚收到了一个增加的电子邮件。几周前，似乎他们正在清理旧帐户。感觉就像他们正在清理书籍并增加光学用户的收入。 将最终IPO Stripe？恭喜大家！
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=43417347 点：1 ＃评论：0

item.title: Show HN：AI代理的MCP兼容分布式RPC层
item.description:
Hey HN,We've been hacking around with LLMs for a while and have encountered a specific problem with distributed tool calling.The ProblemWhen building AI agents or LLM-automations in distributed environments, you typically:- Need to build APIs for your distributed tools- Require load balancers in front of tool replicas (e.g. in k8s environments)- Must在HTTP超时约束中工作的重构长期运行的工具我们的解决方案：AgentRPC AgentRPC通过将任何功能转换为消费者的分布式消息队列，可以通过长期付费来解决这些挑战。消费者注册为中央服务器注册： - 监视其健康 - 维护有关函数模式的上下文 ##功能 centrpc sdks提供： - 一个统一的MCP兼容服务器 - 在OpenAI SDK兼容prodibal protroft PORT - PORT - PORT - - 可观察性由于工具调用是通过基于HTTP HTTP的API进行的，因此它可以处理远远超出HTTP超时限制的工具调用。我们当前支持打字稿，GO和Python，并具有更多的开发中的SDK，检查US。 rel =“ nofollow”> https://agentrpc.com/ 我们还早，但热衷于听到任何反馈！
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43417323 点：1 ＃评论：0

item.title: 对ISO认证公司的市场研究
item.description:
Hi, I am doing some market research on companies that own a ISO/IEC 42001:2023 certification.I didn't have any luck on finding a public list with companies that own this precise certification.My interest is mostly on companies that operate in EU (the companies don't need to be based in EU, but they do need to have some activity in the European Union ex: OpenAI, Anthropic, Scale AI etc.).I am very open to any获取此类列表的常规/非规定方式。 thx。
评论URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=43417241 点：1 ＃评论：0
